title: *Brasos
description: An ancient settlement of Roman date in western Rhodes attested in ancient textual sources. It may be associated with a locale known today as Prasos/Kastelli.

properties.description: Barrington Atlas hollow point icon digitized using QGIS from a raster image of the BAtlas map georegistered to the original projection (ONC G-3) using grid lines. Dates after BAtlDir.
properties.title: BAtlas Location of *Brasos
